index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF CONSTRUCTION AND LAND USE
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Light Dept. and the Dept. of Construction and Land Use; authorizing acceptance of the Bonneville Power Administration Northwest Energy Code Cooperative Agreement; authorizing the Superintendent of City Light to enter into agreements necessary to implement said cooperative agreement; increasing and expenditure allowance, and authorizing transfer of cooperative agreement funds from the Light Fund to the Construction and Land Use Operating Fund.
